name: Norman Nuthu
title: Software Engineer
bio: A highly technical, team-oriented professional with extensive experience in software development. Demonstrated ability to work through a problem effectively and provide the best solution.
description:
I am a passionate Software Developer building things for the Android and Web Platforms, Professional Deejay, Young Entrepreneur and a Lover of Life! I am a Learning Success Software Developer. 
 I'm a highly resourceful Software Developer and well-rounded IT Professional possessing expert knowledge of the Software Development lifecycle and a solid understanding of technologies required for the development and deployment of highly available and scalable applications, including their networks and infrastructure. 
 Passionate about creating a positive user experience, I enjoy working with and adapting to technologies as they develop.
